thread.title: USAFIS Organization is Proud to Announce the Opening of Submission for the Green Card Lottery Program
thread.title_full: USAFIS Organization is Proud to Announce the Opening of Submission for the Green Card Lottery Program - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: USAFIS Organization is Proud to Announce the Opening of Submission for the Green Card Lottery Program
text:
USAFIS
NEW YORK , October 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Every year, in the U.S. Department of State's annual Green Card Diversity Visa Program 100,000 applications are selected as winners and up to 55,000 Green Cards or Permanent Residency Visas are provided to new immigrants from all over the world.
This year, the Submission period of applications for the upcoming Green Card Lottery is between the 1 st of October and the 3 rd of November 2015 .
USAFIS immigration experts will review, correct and submit your GC lottery application, and submit it to the US state department for participation in the lottery, giving you a fair and equal opportunity to be a green card lottery winner!
USAFIS experts will provide the professional and personalized support needed, in addition to a confirmation receipt after the application is submitted to certify the registration. USAFIS will guarantee the comprehensive registration and ensure applicants participation in the Green Card DV Lottery Program.
The USAFIS Organization is known worldwide as the leading company in the immigration field. USAFIS is responsible for more than 47,000 families that have won a Green Card and are pursuing their dream to immigrate to the US. USAFIS clients constitute between 10-30% of the winners from each country.
The USAFIS Organization works throughout the entire year in order to prepare their applicants for a thorough and immaculate submission process. The USAFIS organization is currently submitting their customers' applications to the next DV lottery.
Applicants that are interested in participating in the upcoming DV program with professional and personalized support are welcome to visit our website and start the process immediately.
For more information about the U.S. Green Card Diversity Visa program or the USAFIS Organization, please visit http://www.usafis.org or contact:
Director of Marketing: Jessica Wes, +1-212-937-3322, support@usafis.org , http://www.usafis.org
